channel.title: things didn't know about half life.
channel.description:
no clue which section I should put this in, but recently saw this video [youtube.com/watch?v=1tvz0WVaQGg](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1tvz0WVaQGg)
and well it was something I didn't know about the AI in half life, is there anything you guys have found out after years of playing but never noticed yourselves?

item.title: things didn't know about half life.
item.dc:creator: TheDeltality
item.description:
most of what this guy posted is something I didn’t know about Half-Life. Breast jiggle physics for assassins for example

Read full topic
item.source: things didn't know about half life.

item.title: things didn't know about half life.
item.dc:creator: darkone
item.description:
hmm aparently the HEV suit was at one point planned to have a lot more utilities. as most people know of its cut modules will just post a few video links I found of the audio stuff.

item.title: things didn't know about half life.

item.description:
Wow, I never pay attention to these details. Thank you for sharing this. I’ll be glad to see this added to Black Mesa AI.

item.title: things didn't know about half life.
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Don’t know about it specifically, but they will decide to eat corpses on their own. They gib 'em and eat the gibs, too.

item.title: things didn't know about half life.
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Half-Life 1AI’s is so complex it graduated college but it still only got a shitty job flipping burgers at a Seattle fast food joint.
